policies.involuntary_refund:
• Involuntary Refunds (Article 11.2):- If your flight is canceled, rescheduled, or you miss a connection due to carrier fault:
    - Full refund if no part of the ticket was used
    - Partial refund = fare paid minus applicable fare for used segments

policies.voluntary_refund:
• Voluntary Refunds (Article 11.3):- Full refund minus service fees if unused
  - Partial refund minus service fees based on used travel portion
policies.medical_refund: None of our agents, employees, or representatives has authority to alter, modify, or waive any provision of these Terms and Conditions of Carriage.
policies.name_change:
Name changes are allowed only before ticketing, for up to 20% of the group.
• After ticketing: No name changes allowed
• Excess requests are treated as cancellations
policies.group_booking:
Applicable to branch office in Thailand and all GSAs except India.

• Deposit Deadlines:
  - 30% initial deposit ≥ 3 months prior
  - Names: ≥ 14 days prior
  - Final payment: ≥ 7 days prior

• Seat Management:
  - Reduce: split PNR, up to 20% refundable
  - Increase: allowed before deposit via new PNR
  - Refund: whole group only, conditions apply
policies.infant_policy:
Infants under 14 days, premature or medically unfit infants not accepted.
• 1 adult = 1 infant. Additional infant charged as child fare w/ cabin crew.
• Cabin crew request: ≥ 3 days (domestic), ≥ 5 days (international)
• Escort combinations apply to INF/CHD groupings.
• Max infant load per flight: 10% of aircraft capacity
policies.baggage_policy:
• Carry-on: 7 kg
• Checked: 23 kg (32 kg for BKK routes)
• Valuables must not be checked
• Ticket and baggage must be correctly tagged and verified by K6
policies.seat_request_policy:
Carrier does not guarantee specific seating.
• Purchased seats may be reassigned
• Seats assigned in class of service purchased
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
For flights to or from the United States, Cambodia Angkor Air complies with the U.S. Department of Transportation 24-hour rule:
• A full refund is available if the ticket is canceled within 24 hours of booking, provided the flight is at least 7 days away at the time of booking.
• After this 24-hour window, cancellation policies and any applicable fees will depend on the specific fare rules of the ticket.
• Refund requests must be submitted via the online helpdesk or a Cambodia Angkor Air branch office.
